com.sun.msv.reader
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.msv.reader.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler, GrammarReaderController
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements GrammarReaderController, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

Internal view of GrammarReaderController. This class wraps a GrammarReaderController and adds several convenient methods for the caller.
